content: fin length row 1 make a chain using both strands of your gray yarn and your 5mm hook- single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk and each st across row 2 chain 2 2hdc in chain 2 spot-for straight up front or chain 3 double_crochet+2hdc in chain spot- to have it point forward like the picture half_double_crochet in next 3 sts *2hdc half_double_crochet in next 3 sts * until you reach the back of the head going down to the neck part this will be a straight section so we will not need any increases just half_double_crochet in the last 12 or so sts fasten_off the easiest way to sew the fin on it starting from the top of the head and working down to the neck while i was sewing mine on i had a very hard time keeping it centered so i used a contrasting briecrochet designs copyright © 2013 knights helmet adult sizes page 4 yarn to mark the center right down the hat from top to bottom just loosely weave it in and out you can cut it and pull it off after the fin is in place and centered nicely briecrochet designs copyright © 2013 knights helmet adult sizes page 5
